nodes.text: Narsacc Habitat was one of the six triangular luxury pods of Toryaz Station. It was 40 meters thick and 250 meters across, and connected to the main station by a 250 meter long spoke. It contained Kallebarth Way and Varganner Way. In 40 ABY, the meeting between Gilad Pellaeon and Aidel Saxan took place on Narsacc Habitat.
